locks.notes: Example lock entry - this file is a template

description: Branch reservation system for coordinating parallel subagent work. Managed by Scrum Master subagent (@Ottavio). See ADR-011 in docs/architecture/decisions.md for protocol details.

_usage.purpose: This is a TEMPLATE file showing the structure of branch-locks.json
_usage.actual_file: The actual branch-locks.json file is gitignored (runtime state)
_usage.initialization: Copy this template to branch-locks.json to initialize a new repository
lock_statuses: active - Branch currently reserved and in use
completed - Work finished, PR created, ready to clean up
abandoned - Work stopped, branch can be deleted
_usage.coordination_protocol: See ADR-011 in docs/architecture/decisions.md for full details
